appExtensionDescription.message: Your extension wallet on The Open Network

actionTitle.description: The action title of the application

World_class_speed_description.message: TON is a network designed for speed and throughput. Fees are significantly lower than on other blockchains, and transactions are confirmed in a matter of seconds.

End_to_end_security_description.message: Tonkeeper stores your cryptographic keys on your device without requiring documents, personal information, contact details, or KYC.

Built_in_subscriptions_description.message: TON subscriptions are peer-to-peer and borderless so that no one can restrict providers or customers. Near-zero fees and full control for you.

Let_s_set_up_your_wallet_description.message: You need a connected wallet to use Tonkeeper. Either create a new wallet or import an existing one.

Your_wallet_has_just_been_created.message: Your wallet has just been created!
Your_wallet_has_just_been_created.description: Your wallet has just been created title

Grab_a_pen.message: Grab a pen and a piece of paper
Grab_a_pen.description: Initialize screen Grab a pen and a piece of paper title

Grab_a_pen_description.message: We strongly recommend you write down the recovery phrase because it’s the only way to have access to and recover your wallet should you lose your device. Do not send it to yourself via email or take a screenshot. It’s safer when kept offline.
Grab_a_pen_description.description: Initialize screen Grab a pen and a piece of paper description

Your_recovery_phrase.description: Initialize screen Your recovery phrase title

Your_recovery_phrase_description.message: Write down these 24 words in the order given below and store them in a secret, safe place.
Your_recovery_phrase_description.description: Initialize screen Your recovery phrase description

Enter_your_recovery_phrase.description: Initialize screen Enter your recovery phrase title

Enter_your_recovery_phrase_description.message: To restore access to your wallet, enter the 24 secret recovery words given to you when you created your wallet.
Enter_your_recovery_phrase_description.description: Initialize screen Enter your recovery phrase description

So_let_s_check.description: Initialize screen So, let’s check title

So_let_s_check_description.message: To check whether you’ve written down your recovery phrase correctly, please enter the %1%th, %2%th, and %3%st words.
So_let_s_check_description.description: Initialize screen So, let’s check description

Congratulations_You_ve_set_up_your_walle.message: Congratulations! You’ve set up your wallet
Congratulations_You_ve_set_up_your_walle.description: Initialize screen Congratulations! You’ve set up your wallet title
